runs.comm: keeper up to the stumps, Gambhir plays it softly down to point
it's short and he doesn't resist the pull, in the air but there's protection in the deep straighaway
moves away a touch late and Rahane watchfully leaves it alone, he took a pace or two down the pitch
good running, gently clipped in front of mid-on and he hurried the fielder

Dropped! And worse, it's four as well, Gambhir slogs and it's in the air for ages, Shaminda Eranga was the man at deep midwicket and he couldn't get underneath that skier, it must have swirled in the air, ball slips out of his hand and rolls over to the rope
tucked away to the leg side
full toss to begin with and Gambhir wasn't quite ready to put that away, pushed down to mid-off
full outside the off stump and hammered straight to mid-on
wild swing and a miss, came on a bit slower than expected, tried to put that away to the leg side

well Eranga has made amends for that drop! Didn't have to wait too long, another wild swing and a miss, this time Eranga bowled it at the stumps and the middle stump was pegged back, he gets Gambhir, the man he dropped
too wide outside the off stump, doesn't offer a shot
wide outside the off stump, can't control the swing
much better, brings it closer to the off stump and pushed towards point
full outside the off stump and driven well past the covers, had to scamper for the third
crisply driven off the front foot but straight to mid-off
clubbed away! Fractionally short outside the off stump, Kohli picked the length early and pulled off the front foot over midwicket
Kohli and his awesome timing, swings away from the right-hander, just punched it off the front foot and wide of cover, didn't play at it too hard, two fielders give chase
loose shot, wafted at one outside the off stump, moved away slightly
pushed to the off side off the front foot and he sets off quickly
not very convincing but four nevertheless, late away swing and on a full length, really chased it and the ball went sailing over point
punches it to the off side
Kohli at his best, on a good length outside off and what looked like a defensive push was enough to bisect the gap at point, just raced away, great timing
nearly had him there! Goes for the loft over mid-off and he didn't time it as well, just enough to clear the fielder
fullish in length outside off and driven down to mid-off
gets that away movement again, pushed down to cover
begins with a slower ball, the off cutter, beats the bat
slower ball again and softly clipped away down to midwicket
another Kohli classic, it was a low full toss outside off and he ensured he pushed it off the middle of the bat, past point
goes for the off drive but mistimes it to mid-off, goes for the quick single
tries to pinch a single towards short fine leg
full outside off and he chases that, nearly gets a feather edge to the keeper
Kohli nearly edges that one! Perera gets some late movement after pitching and Kohli pokes his bat out at it, Chandimal nearly went up in appeal
the fine leg is up, Perera pitched it fractionally short and down the leg side, he just helped it along its way wide of short fine leg
you can't stop him can you? Full delivery seaming away and he has enough width to slice that past cover and point
make that three in three, drifts on the pads and he easily flicks it to fine leg, hardly any fielder in sight there
and once again he offers the chance, moves away after pitching and Kohli was beaten as he was looking to guide that to third man
gets forward and pushes it down the track
flatter delivery, spins away sharply and he jabs it down to deep cover
tossed up and full, driven through the line to long-off
goes on the back foot and punches him down to deep cover
fuller delivery and driven to the sweeper again
bowls it very flat and he whips it away to deep midwicket
had to scamper that single, he mistimed that punch to mid-off and he was off the blocks
outside the off stump and he punches that down to deep point
another waft outside the off stump, beaten, this kicked up a bit off the pitch
drops it with soft hands on the pitch and thinks of a single
Rahane makes merry with the width outside off, gets forward and lofts it over wide wide long-off, didn't look like he middled it but there was enough in it to take it over the rope
clips it down to midwicket
Herath dives to his left and stops a drive
chops it to the off side
bowls it flat and straight and driven down the pitch
makes room to cut but gets an inside edge to his boot and the ball deflects to the bowler
punched toward cover and he has to scamper that single, the throw was wide of the stumps and he had to dive
works it away to deep square leg and he hurries the second run
goes for the loft but it's an inside out shot over extra cover, safe from the fielder in the deep
keeps low and he whips it off the back foot to mid-on
works it to the on side for a single
makes room, gets on the back foot and cuts hard to sweeper cover
down the track and hammered back to the bowler
gives him the charge and mistimes it to long-on
brings up his fifty in style! Comes down the track and lofts with the turn over mid-off, the fielder in the deep had no chance
down the track again and he forces it down to long-off
down the pitch, checks his shot and works it to long-on
comes forward and drives him down to sweeper cover
mistimes it down to deep midwicket
chips down the track and drills it down to long-on,they're intent on using their feet against Herath
works it to the on side
down the track and he hammers it down to long-on

some relief for Sri Lanka! Tossed up on middle and leg, Rahane was down the track to loft with the turn, ended up chipping it back to the bowler, Mendis didn't give it much air and that's probably why Rahane didn't get the elevation
the googly, pitched outside leg and it hits his pad as he tries to pull
goes back and cuts to point
no stopping him! Kohli chips down the track and lofts against the turn and clears deep midwicket
drifts on the pads and Raina uses his wrists well and flicks it down to fine leg
drifts down the leg side and Raina tries to whip it away
swings but mistimes it down to midwicket who dives
down the leg side and the ball clips his pads and rolls away, he tried to work it fine
fetches that from outside the off stump and pulls along the ground
he continues to fined the gaps, he made a bit of room hoping to hit it in front of square on the on side, ended up getting an inside edge past short fine leg, the ball races to long leg
unlucky for the bowler, this was an attempted yorker, Kohli made room and the ball clipped the boot and deflected to the off side, no slips and that's four
inswinging yorker and he clips it off his pads, Malinga appeals, that was missing leg
chases a low full toss and looks to glide it away past point but the fielder did well to cover it
yorker length and shaping away, Kohli reached out to squeeze it out but couldn't make contact
that was too wide outside off, Kohli didn't even bother chasing that outside off
another one swerves away from him, he gets some bat on it and Chandimal stops it
keeps it full and wide outside off and he forces it down to long-off
swinging in towards the pads and clipped to the leg side, half hearted appeal by Malinga
inswinging full toss, he jams it down the ground to long-off

close call for Kohli and they are appealing for a run-out. And it's close! Kohli reaches out to a full and wide delivery outside off, he nearly scoops it straight to extra cover, the throw by Jayawardene is to Perera who's behind the stumps, the third umpire takes a look, he wasn't convinced if the bail came off the groove before he grounded his bat, Kohli is safe
full on the off stump and driven down the ground to long-off for a couple
turns it to deep midwicket
drills it down to long-off
gives it a swing, Raina's trademark hoick over midwicket, it was on the pads and put away
comes down the track and pushes it to deep midwicket
full outside off and driven down to long-off
comes down the track and mistimes the loft down to long-off, was in the air for a bit
yorker outside the off stump and he fails to squeeze it out
too full and wide outside the off stump and he tries to squeeze it out
fetches it from outside off and places it to long-on
lovely shot! Swinging in on the pads and neatly chipped over square leg, wide of all the fielders
comes back well with a near unplayable yorker, digs it out to mid-on

they finally see the back of Kohli! It was sweetly timed but straight to the fielder at deep midwicket, looked like the slower ball, Kohli swung across the line and it's a flat hit to Thirimanne, easily taken
swings it away and he doesn't make contact
plays and misses! Good one by Eranga, late away movement teases Dhoni and he nearly edges it
fullish outside the off stump and he drives him down to third man
goes for the big cover drive but misses
he errs by bowling it short and he plays the pull really well, down to fine leg and the ball nearly carries over the rope
away swinging yorker and Dhoni is annoyed with himself for swinging and missing
full and wide and gets an outside edge to third man, there was a fumble but couldn't steal a second because Dhoni was ball-watching
really clubbed that one! Half volley on the off stump, went deep in the crease and lofted it down the ground, long-off had no chance
tries to angle a low full toss wide of point, the fielder covers it
full and swinging in and worked down to deep midwicket
swings a low full toss across the line and places it to long-on
fullish in length outside the off stump and he angles it wide of point
another wild swing and a miss outside off, just a matter of time before the bat goes flying off the hand
full outside off and jammed to the off side
ends a good over with a dot ball, yorker length outside off and he fails to jam it out
full outside off and jammed down to third man, has to scamper for the second, beats the throw
unfortunate for Malinga, it was a fast yorker on the off stump and Dhoni got a lucky outside edge that raced past the keeper, third man had no chance
full and wide and he chases that one, can only squeeze it to cover
Raina won't be happy with that shot, it was a shade outside off and he should have hit that straighter, he instead went across the line and missed it completely
just a single, drilled down to long-off
low full toss outside off and he swings and gets an outside edge straight to third man, Dilshan was placed fine
